summary: Mobile responsiveness and iOS-style theme testing completed. All core features working correctly - mobile header, slide-over menu, theme toggle, navigation, FAB, desktop sidebar. One minor UI issue found: SMIFS Ltd badge overlaps FAB button on mobile.

ui_bugs.issue: SMIFS Ltd badge at bottom-right overlaps with FAB (New Booking) button, preventing direct clicks on FAB
ui_bugs.workaround: Users can navigate to Bookings via mobile menu instead

passed_tests: === MOBILE HEADER (All passed) ===
PRIVITY title visible in mobile header with gradient styling
Notification bell with badge visible and functional
Theme toggle (sun/moon icon) visible and functional
Hamburger menu button visible and opens slide-over menu
=== MOBILE SLIDE-OVER MENU (All passed) ===
Menu opens from right side with smooth animation
User info card shows name and role (PE Desk Super Admin / Employee)
Navigation items display with icons and chevrons
Close button (X) works correctly
Logout button visible and styled in red
Change Password button visible
Menu closes on navigation item click
Menu does NOT overlap content when closed
=== DESKTOP SIDEBAR (All passed) ===
Fixed sidebar visible on desktop (>=1024px)
PRIVITY title with gradient styling
All navigation items visible with icons
User name and role displayed at bottom
Theme toggle works (Dark Mode / Light Mode)
Notifications section visible
Logout button visible
Mobile header hidden on desktop
FAB hidden on desktop
=== THEME SWITCHING (All passed) ===
Light mode displays correctly with white/gray backgrounds
Dark mode displays correctly with dark backgrounds
Theme toggle works on both mobile and desktop
Theme persists across navigation
=== NAVIGATION (All passed) ===
Dashboard page loads correctly
Clients page loads correctly
Bookings page loads correctly
Navigation via mobile menu works
Navigation via desktop sidebar works
=== DASHBOARD STATS (All passed) ===
Stats display in 2-column grid on mobile
Stats display in 6-column grid on desktop
iOS-style stat cards with proper styling
Inventory Value, Closed Bookings, Total Revenue cards visible
=== FAB (Floating Action Button) ===
FAB visible on mobile at bottom-right
FAB hidden on desktop
FAB styled with emerald color and shadow
FAB click blocked by SMIFS badge overlay (minor issue)
=== ROLE-BASED ACCESS (All passed) ===
PE Desk Super Admin: 18 navigation items
Employee: 8 navigation items (restricted access)
Login works for both user types
action_items: MINOR: Adjust z-index or position of SMIFS Ltd badge to not overlap FAB button on mobile
critical_code_review_comments: Layout.js properly implements responsive design with lg:hidden and hidden lg:flex classes
iOS-style theme variables and utilities in index.css are well-structured
data-testid attributes properly implemented for all interactive elements
Slide-over menu uses proper transform transitions and backdrop blur
Body scroll prevention when sidebar is open is correctly implemented
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mobile responsiveness and iOS-style theme are fully functional. The SMIFS Ltd badge at bottom-right slightly overlaps the FAB button - this is a minor z-index/positioning issue. All navigation, theme switching, and role-based access working correctly.

features_verified.Mobile Header: WORKING - PRIVITY title, notification bell, theme toggle, hamburger menu all visible
features_verified.Mobile Slide-over Menu: WORKING - Opens from right, shows user info, navigation, logout
features_verified.Desktop Sidebar: WORKING - Fixed sidebar with all navigation items
features_verified.Theme Switching: WORKING - Light/dark mode toggle works on both mobile and desktop
features_verified.FAB Button: PARTIALLY WORKING - Visible but overlapped by SMIFS badge
features_verified.Navigation: WORKING - All pages accessible via menu
features_verified.Role-based Access: WORKING - PE Desk has 18 items, Employee has 8 items
